Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1966...
Released by Baltimore on 3/2/1966...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 3/2/1966 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/2/1968 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1969, off Juan Marichal (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1969, off Jim Lonborg (CHC)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Oakland on 7/21/1969 (Going to LA: LF K. Harrelson. Going to OAK: 2B T. Sizemore)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 4/19/1971...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
